thread.title: Nigeria: Reps Probe EU's Ban On Exportation of Food From Nigeria
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Reps Probe EU's Ban On Exportation of Food From Nigeria

title: Nigeria: Reps Probe EU's Ban On Exportation of Food From Nigeria
text:
Kenya: NGO to Sue Cop Over Stripping Girl 
The House also urged the National Agency for Food Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) to ensure that food products are properly processed to meet the requirements and standards set by EU. 
The decision was taken after adopting a motion by Rep Jerry Alagbaoso (PDP, Imo), who noted that in issuing the ban, EU said some Nigerian food products contained "high level of unauthorized pesticides, while the others were suspected of lacking proper storage." 
He said NAFDAC director-general had blamed the exporters of those products of being responsible for the ban due to their non-compliance with the regulatory requirements for semi-processed and processed commodities, adding that the negative impact of the ban on farmers of such products could not be imagined. Nigeria
